data.title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT Stability to 'Weak' Due to Bitcoin Backing Concerns
data.description: S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Tether's USDT, warning that the industry-leading stablecoin could suffer if Bitcoin's price crashes. Tether disagrees.
data.keywords: Tether, S&P, Credit ratings, U.S. dollar
